segments.text: I see the water pouring out of the sink, and I feel a sense of anger rise within me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying a plate, completely unaware of the mess she’s making.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting soaked, and it’s going to be such a hassle to clean up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being sneaky, taking cookies while she’s distracted, and it’s all so frustrating to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a wobbly stool, reaching for the cookie jar, and it’s just infuriating to see.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is right there with him, waiting for her share, and it’s all so maddening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is filled with a sense of chaos, and I can’t stand it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I need to do something, but I’m stuck here, watching it all unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen is a disaster waiting to happen, and it’s all so avoidable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope someone steps in and fixes this mess before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
